parameters.name: categories
parameters.description: Optional filter; when omitted, returns mappings for all categories. Supports repeated params (?categories=math&categories=string) or comma-separated (?categories=math,string).

200.description: Returns a mapping of formula categories to the function names available in each category

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Optional function name filter (case-insensitive). When provided, the response is either an array with one function or a 400 when not found.

shape.description: Defines the object shape structure (e.g. PHONE)

configShape.description: Defines the configuration structure (e.g. options for SELECT)

name.description: New name for the object type

reverseName.description: Label for the reverse direction (target -> source).

apiName.description: Lowercase snake_case identifier, unique per company.

isBidirectional.description: When true, the association type can be created from either endpoint and traversed both ways.

reverseName.description: Label for the reverse direction (target -> source). Required when isBidirectional is true (or omitted).
Label for the reverse direction (target -> source). Required when setting isBidirectional=true.

objectTypeId.description: CRM object type id used to derive available fields and their primitive types for validation.

description.description: Customer-facing description of what the function does

fieldTypes.description: Map of field apiName -> primitive value type

name.description: New display name of the field

description.description: Optional helper text for the field

isFormulaCapable.description: Whether this field type can be configured as a formula output

isUsableInFormula.description: Whether fields of this type can be referenced inside formulas

contentType.description: Optional MIME type from the browser (defaults to text/csv)

sampleRows.description: Sample rows as arrays of column values
Sample rows as arrays of column values

sourceMatchField.description: CRM field id to match on source object

targetMatchField.description: CRM field id to match on target object
